title: Complete Blood Count (CBC)
short_description: A comprehensive test that measures different components of the blood, including red blood cells, white blood cells, hemoglobin, and platelets.

title: Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI)
short_description: An imaging test that uses powerful magnets and radio waves to create detailed images of organs and tissues in the body.

title: Ultrasound
short_description: A diagnostic imaging technique that uses high-frequency sound waves to create images of the inside of the body, commonly used in prenatal care.
